title: Expiration dates
body: Much to the chagrin of Nicole and starving children the world over, I refuse to eat or drink anything past its expiration date. If the milk says "BEST IF USED BY OCT 25" and I wake up at 1:15 AM on October 26th for a late-night snack, I won't touch it.
author: Dan

comments.author: dave
comments.body: i'm that way about canned plankton.

comments.author: bjork24
comments.body: I steer clear of canned food altogether. Botulism frightens me.

comments.author: Luke
comments.body: I eat a lot of canned food, but if I find one dent in the can, it might as well be canned botulism as far as I'm concerned.

comments.author: bjork24
comments.body: Damn botulism and all it's kin!

comments.author: Nicole
comments.body: Mmmm, canned pumpkin. I'll eat it every day, all day long.

comments.author: bjork24
comments.body: I've got to quit buying that stuff for her!
